@colorado-features@: The most famous balneological resort of the USA in the Rocky Mountains. Olympic-size pool with mineral water at 30-32°C. Vapor caves (Native American healing baths). Entrance tickets, stay at a wonderful 5 star hotel above the pool, dietary food, Slavic kitchen, Polish restaurant, trips to surrounding areas
